channel.title: A fly command?
channel.description: how would i make a fly command?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 11:59:24 AM[/size][hr]anyone

item.title: A fly command?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“kate, post:2, topic:174375”][quote author=Bacus23 link=topic=234794.msg2003122#msg2003122 date=1200695458]
how would i make a fly command?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 11:59:24 AM[/size][hr]anyone
[/quote]don’t double post…
well u mean like ::god? or something?
well, i got one
100%to ric914, i took it from his source ;D

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 0) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 0){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
add this in your client.java[/quote]

This helped me a lot. I couldn’t find a working one for Devolution. =p, your rep was boosted for some reason. (Not me…) -.-

Read full topic

item.title: A fly command?
item.dc:creator: @kate kate
item.description:
@kate wrote:

[quote=“Bacus23, post:1, topic:174375”]how would i make a fly command?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 11:59:24 AM[/size][hr]anyone[/quote]don’t double post…
well u mean like ::god? or something?
well, i got one
100%to ric914, i took it from his source ;D

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 0) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 0){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
add this in your client.java
